title: President Donald J. Trump Signed S.1595 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
October 25, 2018
On Thursday, October 25, 2018, the President signed into law:S. 1595, the “Hizballah International Financing Prevention Amendments Act of 2018,” which expands sanctions on foreign entities that support Hizballah or its agents.
